pullrequest.title: Adding gps mesh, collisions and inertia

content.raw:
I like the mesh of the GPS antenna.  Would it be possible to remove the “mast” that is holding the GPS so high up off the deck?  In general, I think teams will try to keep the GPS antennae as low as possible to avoid motion caused by pitch and roll, so locating the white antenna on the deck might look a little more consistent.

This may be a naive question - but what is the purpose of the added PNG file?  It is pretty large \(~4MB\) and just looking at the file it is tough to see how it is being used.  I couldn’t open the mesh in Blender to look any deeper into the possibility - it looks like the mesh was exported from Maya.
content.html:
I like the mesh of the GPS antenna. Would it be possible to remove the “mast” that is holding the GPS so high up off the deck? In general, I think teams will try to keep the GPS antennae as low as possible to avoid motion caused by pitch and roll, so locating the white antenna on the deck might look a little more consistent.

This may be a naive question - but what is the purpose of the added PNG file? It is pretty large (~4MB) and just looking at the file it is tough to see how it is being used. I couldn’t open the mesh in Blender to look any deeper into the possibility - it looks like the mesh was exported from Maya.
